episodes.title: 10 Golden Age Actors Raised in the "Christian Science" Cult
12 Stars Who Escaped the "Moral Re-Armament" Cult
7 Hollywood Families Destroyed by the "Children of God" Cult
episodes.description:
River Phoenix didn't die from Hollywood excess—he died from childhood trauma inflicted by the Children of God cult between ages 4 and 7. This documentary reveals how seven Hollywood families, including the Phoenixes, Rose McGowan, and others, survived one of the most disturbing religious organizations in modern history, where thousands of children suffered systematic abuse disguised as divine love.

October 31, 1993: Joaquin Phoenix screamed into a 911 call as his brother River convulsed outside the Viper Room. The world blamed fame and drugs, but the real story began two decades earlier when the Bottom family joined David Berg's cult in South America. This video exposes the hidden connection between Hollywood's brightest stars and a religious organization that victimized over 4,000 children across multiple continents. From Rose McGowan's fearless MeToo activism to Joaquin Phoenix's haunting performances, you'll discover how childhood cult trauma shaped an entire generation of actors—and why some survivors, like Berg's own son Ricky Rodriguez, couldn't escape their past. We reveal survivor testimonies, the "Victor Camps" where rebellious teens were psychologically tortured, and the famous face who's never been publicly named as a cult survivor until now.
